title: Create a busybox pod that runs 'notexist'. Determine if there's an error (of course there is), see it. In the end, delete the pod forcefully with a 0 grace period
description: Create a busybox pod that runs 'notexist'. Determine if there's an error (of course there is), see it. In the end, delete the pod forcefully with a 0 grace period

steps: 2. kubectl logs busybox # will bring nothing! container never started
3. kubectl describe po busybox # in the events section, you'll see the error
4. kubectl get events | grep -i error # you'll see the error here as well
